projects.title: LIMITED EDITION SERIES
projects.type: ADVANCED | ALL-IN-ONE | SMART | PERFECT FOR HOMES AND SMALL OFFICES
projects.promo_offer: Monthly rental will be charged after 2nd month.
projects.note_1: Service fee includes all types of general servicing and parts replacement for up to 3 years, after that monthly service fees are PKR 3,500 inclusive of taxes. Filter replacements are done based on real time health status as per our service protocols
projects.note_2: Service fee includes all types of general servicing and parts replacement for up to 5 years, after that monthly service fees are PKR 4,000 inclusive of taxes. Filter replacements are done based on real time health status as per our service protocols
projects.tagline: ADVANCED | ALL-IN-ONE | SMART | PERFECT FOR HOMES AND SMALL OFFICES
projects.short_description: 1. Monthly Service Fee Includes All Types Of General Servicing And Parts Replacement.
projects.short_description2: 2. Filter Replacements Are Done On A Periodic Cycle Of 90 Days or 3000 Liters Which Ever Comes First.

additional.heading: Project Result
additional.content:
Our immediate goal is to complete the testing phase and achieve the certification, which will allow us to bring our product to market by the end of the year. We are actively engaging with waste to energy operators, concrete manufacturers, and the wider construction industry.
